CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 24, 1946, pg. 16, reads: "Time for Play - Some of the children of Terrace Village are shown at Friendship House on Centre Avenue during the afternon [afternoon] play session. Mrs. Mary Price is director of the center, which offers supervised recreation for all boys and girls in the neighborhood. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mary Price standing near children playing in room with stove and wall plaque reading "In memory of Ernestine Payne Tate and Mary Shaw Campbell" in Friendship House, Centre Avenue, Hill District
